item.title: Npc talk
item.dc:creator: @ths-privates ths-privates
item.description:
@ths-privates wrote:

nooo thats somthing different
i need the file and the code how i can let somthing like all npc id324 say welcome on … scape[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2009, 01:53:00 am[/size][hr]can someone help please

Read full topic

item.title: Npc talk
item.dc:creator: @Menno582 Menno582
item.description:
@Menno582 wrote:

Use it like this (317, delta):

		case 153:
			playertalk("Ughh... My head...", "Where am I...?");
			break;
		case 154:
			talk2("This is WoeshieScape.", "I saw you lain on the beach...", 0);
			break;
		case 155:
			playertalk("Uhg, I can't remember anything..", "Hmm...");
			break;
		case 156:
			playertalk("Well, I'll have to stay here.. ", "");
			break;
		case 157:
			talk("Well, have fun on WoeshieScape.", 0);
			break;
		case 158:
			talk("Use your spellbook to teleport around!", 0);
			break;

Read full topic
